name: Bump in the night (BoersInc)
description:
This game is here is part of a personal game jam for improving my own game design, when to scrop down/cut game ideas and get better at rapid prototyping just to get an idea out there. 

Any criticism or helpful tips would be nice.

Thanks to @ChevyRay for making the text font. Go check them out.

-Game Controls-

Movement - arrow keys

Flashlight On/Off - T

Flag put down - C

Interact - Z
